<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><category display_value="Customer Service Topics">b28634c4b7b93300da7ab948ee11a93a</category><channels/><connect_queue/><description>Guide New user</description><flexible_conversation_switching>true</flexible_conversation_switching><graph>{

          "stepType": "Start",
          "name": "Start",
          "greetingResponse": {
            "value": "Hi {{vaInputs.user.name}} how can I help you",
            "mode": "simple"
          }
        },
        "5f31b626b95d4111b418428b4e0799fc": {
          "id": "5f31b626b95d4111b418428b4e0799fc",
          "stepType": "TerminateGoal",
          "name": "End",
          "confirmationMessage": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n    return '';\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          }
        },
